nodes.text: "Retreat from Coruscant" is a short story written by Laurie Burns. It originally appeared in Star Wars Adventure Journal 7 by West End Games in August 1995 and was later reprinted in the short story anthology Tales from the Empire which was published by Bantam Spectra in November 1997.

The story takes place shortly before the events of Star Wars: Dark Empire in 10 ABY. With an Imperial fleet surrounding Coruscant, General Garm Bel Iblis enlists the help of Taryn Clancy, an employee of the Core Courier Service, to deliver word of the evacuation to the New Republic Defense Fleet at a secret location.
